comment: Watch how the NY Times announce that Trump is a fascist and make parallels to Nazi Germany.

(w / watch-01

            :op1 (a2 / announce-01

                              :op1 "NY"
                              :op2 "Times"))
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :mod (p2 / political-movement
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Fascism"))

                              :op1 "Trump"))))
      :op2 (p3 / parallel-01

            :ARG1 (c / country
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Germany")
                  :mod (p4 / political-party
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "Nazi")))))
